name: Rage in Peace
description: Rage in Peace is a story-driven action adventure with elements of surprise and memorization. Unravel the last day of Timmy's life, as he races against time to get back home and fulfill his sole dream of dying peacefully in his pajamas, in the warmth of home, in peace, and with no drama.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo
